Name: Breach of Contract Online
About the game: Breach of Contract Online is a multiplayer First-Person Shooter Game. Breach of Contract is all about survival of the fittest. Start epic battles of 30 players in an all new Last Man Standing mode. The final player left wins the match. Every time a player is killed the player is eliminated and must find a new match. Play on an all new Escape map based on a tropical island fight til the very end. MAIN FEATURES Server Browser Team Deathmatch & FFA In-Game Currency 4 Maps 8-10 players per TDM match 30 players per FFA match Over a dozen weapons Chat System (Team/Global) Voice Chat Global Breach of Contract is a new an innovative First-Person Shooter Online Game. Compete with players all across the board. Battle against players in multiple terrains from deserts to urban cities. Epic battles from 8-30 player matches allowing absolute chaos. With so many players to kill and GP to earn to purchase new weapons for battle what are you waiting for? Put endless amounts of time into the game. The game is centered around the idea of simplistic and addictive gameplay. With 2 different game modes to play on you can pick your battles and fight in totally different scenarios. Closed off Arena Maps or Last Man Standing Open World Type Matches. You take the pick and decide. Earn weapons in this game to make you the best. Fight your way to the top of Last Man Standing and be the best! Progressive System Earn more weapons by killing enemy players. Accumulate GP (Gamepoints) and purchase new weapons. There is NO microtransactions for this title.
